pros:
I have been here nearly 5 years now and can't see myself leaving anytime soon!
The people really make this organisation, they are dedicated, welcoming, friendly and inclusive. I have seen a lot of growth over the past few years and lots of great projects and advancements coming with this growth. 
Since the pandemic there has been a real focus on wellbeing, including sessions on Mindfulness and a new Hybrid Working Policy, I would love to see more growth in this area.
Over the past couple of years we have also had several "Town Hall" sessions via Zoom with our global workforce and this has felt great in bringing everyone together and providing updates from around the world.
Will also be great to see when the salary band work in the UK is published!
cons: Workloads can be high at times which can have an impact, however I think this unfortunately very common in our sector rather than specific to FFI!
